snippet.title: Wheat Harvest Paradox - A psx style game where time goes backward!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://kenforest.itch.io/wheat-harvest-paradox?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt A psx style game where you harvest with a harvester. However, you do not live in an ordinary world, you live in a very gloomy and old giant city. Where all the inhabitants of this city are stuck in a time loop. Every day the direction of time changes. It can go both forward and in the opposite direction. 

The game was made in 72 hours for ludum dare 52 on the theme "Harvest".

➡️ More from KenForest https://kenforest.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
